text: Reused parameter definitions gathered easier usage. Note: intentionally use id rather standardized strID throughout package, shiny::testServer() specifically expects id argument module server functions.

title: Parameters used in multiple functions — shared-params
text: chrLinkIDs character Module ids multiple modules. chrLabels character vector labels display user. chrMessage character vector message elements formatted via cli::cli_bullets(). chrMetrics character named vector MetricIDs, names full Metric. chrRequiredColumns character vector expected columns data.frame. chrSites character vector sites available study. chrValues character vector values associate vector labels. dfAnalyticsInput data.frame Participant-level metric data. dfBounds data.frame Set predicted percentages/rates upper- lower-bounds across full range sample sizes/total exposure values reporting. dfGroups data.frame Group-level metadata dictionary. dfMetrics data.frame Metric-specific metadata use charts reporting. dfParticipantGroups data.frame Unique SubjectID GroupID combos dfAnalyticsInput. dfResults data.frame stacked summary analysis pipeline output. filtered cases GroupLevel == "Site". envCall environment environment function called, use better error messages. value usually left default, passed calling function calling function also envCall argument. envEvaluate environment environment variables used message defined. almost definitely want leave default value. fnFetchParticipantData function function takes single strSubjectID argument "0001", returns list components metadata metric_data. metadata named character vector (something can coerced character vector) information participant, metric_data named list data.frames, contains information related named metric. fnServer function Shiny server function takes arguments input, output, session. function called start main app server function. id character id module, widget, element. intKRIColorCount integer named vector counts color. intNParticipants integer number unique participants (subjects) study. intRed integer number sites least one red flag. intAmber integer number sites least one amber flag. lMetric list Named list data describing single metric, well things like group selected. lParticipantMetadata list Named list data describing single participant. lStudy list Named list data describing overall study. rctv_chrIDs reactive character shiny::reactive() object returns vector ids modules, inputs, elements. rctv_dfBounds reactive dataframe shiny::reactive() object returns set predicted percentages/rates upper- lower-bounds across full range sample sizes/total exposure values reporting. rctv_dfResults reactive dataframe shiny::reactive() object returns stacked summary analysis pipeline output. rctv_lData reactive list shiny::reactive() object returns named list dataframes. rctv_lMetric reactive list shiny::reactive() object returns named list data describing single metric, well things like group selected. rctv_lParticipantMetricData reactive list shiny::reactive() object returns list dataframes given participant, one metric available. rctv_lglState reactive logical shiny::reactive()] object returns Boolean value indicating whether something "" (FALSE) "" (TRUE). rctv_strGroupSubset reactive character shiny::reactive() object returns selected subset groups include table. rctv_strMetricID reactive character shiny::reactive() object returns selected MetricID. rctv_strName reactive character shiny::reactive() object returns name object, particular dataframe named list. rctv_strSiteID reactive character shiny::reactive() object returns GroupID site. rctv_strSubjectID reactive character shiny::reactive() object returns SubjectID selected participant. rctv_strValue reactive character shiny::reactive() object returns value field. session environment Session make child scope (default almost always used). strArg character name argument calling function. general, value either left default, passed calling function calling function also strArg argument. strClass character descriptive label type error, lower_snake_case. strColorFamily character Whether load "dark" version color, "light" version. Default: "dark". strColorName character target color report . strColorCode character hex code ("#FFFFFF") color. strContainerID character (namespaced) ID target container (usually div). strGroupID character GroupID focus . strGroupLabelKey character Value group label key. Default: "InvestigatorLastName". strGroupLevel character Value group level. Default: NULL taken dfMetrics$GroupLevel available. strGroupSubset character Subset groups include table. Default: "red". Options: "": groups. "red": Groups 1+ red flags. "red/amber": Groups 1+ red/amber flag. "amber": Groups 1+ amber flag. strInputID character ID use Shiny input created module used JavaScript. strLabel character label field. strMetricID character MetricID focus . strPlotTitle character title plot, usually name metric. strSubjectID character SubjectID individual participant. strTargetTab character tab switch . strText character Text display. strTitle character title display overall app. strValue character value field. tagListSidebar taglist optional htmltools::tagList() additional elements add top app sidebar.

title: gsm.app 2.0.0
text: complete rewrite package use gsm 2.0+.

title: gsm.app 2.0.0
text: sidebar (overall study information drop-menus) can collapsed focus drill-modules. Charts tables can expanded fill browser window. Participant details now loading animations make clearer data processing.

title: gsm.app 2.0.0
text: Renamed package {gsm.app} consistency related apps. Apps produced version package load much faster produced previous version. Numerous improvements made --hood improve stability maintainability. 100% code covered tests.

title: gsm.app 1.0.0
text: first major release {gsmApp}! 🥳

title: gsm.app 1.0.0
text: Adds faceted scatter plot view easy comparison site across assessments. New approach using sample data, using qs. allows app deployed shinyapps.io. columns now available view/inspection given domain. UI modified better user experience.

title: gsm.app 1.0.0
text: Fixed bug sample data erroneously used {gsm} v1.9.2 instead current dev branch, includes fixes htmlwidgets allowing interaction Shiny app.

title: gsm.app 0.6.0
text: release planned pre-v1.0.0 release includes significant changes UI, well changes allow app used experimentally live study data.

title: gsm.app 0.6.0
text: Adds site participant metadata improved drill-functionality. charts linked side-panel, site selected, metadata presented selected site across tabs. UI modified based user feedback provide better experience navigating app.

title: gsm.app 0.6.0
text: Namespacing documentation updated consistent R packages apps ecosystem.
